attributes.action: Suspend council tax payments as part of emergency legislation due to coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: The government has already put emergency legislation down for holiday payments on rent and mortgage, so they need to do the same for council tax.
attributes.background:
I want the government to suspend council tax payments because people with low paid jobs or self-employed won’t be able to afford it with the on going coronavirus problem.

Help me to support this petition and make it reach parliament.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
